actions.committee: House Committee on District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to amend the District of Columbia Income and Franchise Tax Act of 1947 to tax the income of certain elected or appointed officers of the Government of the United States who are domiciled in States which impose income taxes and whose incomes are not taxed by such States.

summary.text: Places a tax, under the District of Columbia Income and Franchise Tax Act of 1947, on the income of qualified elected or appointed officers of the Government of the United States who are domiciled in States which impose income taxes and whose incomes are not taxed by such States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the District of Columbia Income and Franchise Tax Act of 1947 to tax the income of certain elected or appointed officers of the Government of the United States who are domiciled in States which impose income taxes and whose incomes are not taxed by such States.
